message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8000. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I won't be able to accept $8000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I understand your position, Alice. Unfortunately, $11000 is still beyond my current budget. Could you perhaps lower the price further? I am willing to pay up to $9500.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I'm still unable to reach an agreement at $10500. I'm willing to pay up to $9000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can offer it to you for $10000. This is my absolute lowest price, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this point.

I'm glad you're willing to go down to $10000, Alice. It shows your willingness to accommodate my budget. I appreciate that. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $9750. This is my final price, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this point.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. This is my final offer. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already made it clear that $9500 is below my minimum price. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm afraid we're at an impasse. I'm going to have to sell the product to someone else.
